# One Mind, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 149

This spell functions like *[[One Mind (Spell)|one mind]],* except as noted here, and in addition you and your mount gain a +2 bonus on melee damage rolls as long as you are mounted.
